replies.msg:
CPU: Intel 6 Cores 6 Threads Core i5-9400F Coffee Lake

Motherboard: ASUS PRIME B360M-A

RAM: ADATA Premier DDR4 2666MHz 8GB x2

Display Card: GIGABYTE GTX1660TI 6GB GDDR6 OC Edition

HDD: WD Blue WD10EZEX 1TB SATA3 6Gb/s /64MB HDD

SDD: Intel 256GB SSD 760p SSDPEKKW256G8XT M.2 2280 PCIe        NVMe 3.0 x4

PSU: 唔知邊隻比較好

Case: ANTEC P7 Window Side Panel

主要用黎打機多, 有時都想用黎執下相
畢直大約6000hkd左右
另外想問motherboard b360同b365個分別係咩
